nodes.text: Fortune's Favor was a Wayfarer-class medium transport that was owned by the Oblee crime lord Nirama during the time of the Clone Wars.

Fortune's Favor made features in Incursion, an adventure in the Living Force campaign, where Nirama can lend it to the player characters if they don't have a ship of their own. If they choose to borrow it, then they can also use it in the subsequent adventure, Excursion.
